Workflow.Name: Review Hub - Add Users to New Group - Stakeholders
Workflow.Description: The flow adds newly added Stakeholders to the security group used for administrative access control. Flow failure will result in new Stakeholders not having access to carry out necessary administrative tasks on the system.

LocalizedName.description: Review Hub - Add Users to New Group - Stakeholders

Description.description: The flow adds newly added Stakeholders to the security group used for administrative access control. Flow failure will result in new Stakeholders not having access to carry out necessary administrative tasks on the system.
